column1: 1 ^ The Lord hath reigned~; let the people be angry. He that sitteth on the cherubims~; let the earth be moved.
2 ^ The Lord is great in Sion
3 ^ Let them give praise to thy great name
column2: for it is terrible and holy.

column1: 4 ^ And the king's honour loveth judgment~; thou hast prepared directions~; thou hast done judgment and justice in Jacob.
5 ^ Exalt ye the Lord our God
6 ^ Moses and Aaron among his priests
column2: and Samuel among them that call upon his name. They called upon the Lord

column1: 7 ^ He spoke to them in the pillar of the cloud. They kept his testimonies
column2: and the commandment which he gave them.
thou didst hear them~; thou wast a merciful God to them
column3: and taking vengeance on all their inventions.

column1: 9 ^ Exalt ye the Lord our God
column2: and adore at his holy mountain
column3: for the Lord our God is holy.
